title: Solutions Architect (Software Engineer) LATAM
subtitle: Bitmovin
snippet: Ideal Solution Architect candidates have online video as well as software engineering and web development/SaaS experience as well as ...
fulltext: Bitmovin provides API based Software that helps developers around the world to solve the most complex video problems with a video player library that plays everywhere. Come join the team building innovative online video software for developers and content owners worldwide! We're hiring Solution Architects to foster our customers' technical success and overall happiness! Ideal Solution Architect candidates have online video as well as software engineering and web development/SaaS experience as well as proven success building strong relationships with customers. If you have these characteristics coupled with a desire to apply your skills to make our customers outspoken Bitmovin fans, we want to meet you! Solution Architects are responsible for getting new customers quickly up to speed with Bitmovin, ensuring that they get the most out of the platform, and helping them continue to develop and expand their successful use of Bitmovin's Video Infrastructure for the Web.ill... As a Solution Architect you will Understanding the customer's needs and designing flexible and scalable solutions together with the customers Helping new and existing customers to be successful with the products of Bitmovin Assisting customers with the architecture of their applications Building strong relationships with the developers of our customers Optimize our internal and external documentation and processes Work closely with other teams to improve our product offerings and messaging around new products Gain unique insights into how the biggest media and technologies companies worldwide scale and operate using Bitmovin Making Bitmovin customers wildly successful It would be great if you have BS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical discipline or equivalent experience Solid experience in software engineering, web development, and deployment Interest in Online Video Streaming Designing, scaling and monitoring high traffic web applications Working directly with technical customers as well as thoroughly understanding technical concepts Experience in one or more modern web languages (Ruby, Python, Node.js, PHP, JavaScript, Java, Scala, Go) in a development capacity Full professional English proficiency Bitmovin's Benefits Working with an innovative, fast-growing and international team with low hierarchy Opportunity to make an impact on the multimedia industry, with target markets EU, US and APAC Competitive salary Flexible work hours Investment in growth and education No routines, but new challenging projects with global impact Free snacks and great coffee Open spaced office Regular and fun team activities  Choose your own hardware The opportunity to work for an exciting start-up, building innovative video solutions About Bitmovin Bitmovin, a YCombinator company, is a fast growing privately owned technology leader, located in San Francisco, CA and Klagenfurt, Austria. The company was founded by the co-creators of international media standards like MPEG-DASH, that is used today by Netflix, Youtube, and others. Bitmovin is the technology leader in online video technologies such as cloud-based encoding, adaptive streaming players, 360°/VR streaming and performance analytics. Bitmovin is backed by top investors such as Atomico as well as industry leaders like the former VP Engineering of Netflix, former CTO of Cisco, founder of Unity3D, and many others. Bitmovin's customers include the top media and technology companies worldwide, including Ooyala, RTL, Pro7Sat1, Bouygues Telecom, Cloudflare, Technicolor, Televisa, Zattoo and many others. Working at Bitmovin is fast-paced, fun and challenging with colleagues and customers worldwide. Bitmovin is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. STARTING TIME: Immediately Empower your future and join us now!

title: Desenvolvedor full stack
subtitle: Probono
snippet: Remuneração de R$ 1.700,00 (+ R$ 300,00 após 3 meses de teste), este é o menor valor que você receberá, investimos em cursos e ...
fulltext: Vaga presencial para desenvolvedor full stack para trabalhar em uma Startup. Remuneração de R$ 1.700,00 (+ R$ 300,00 após 3 meses de teste), este é o menor valor que você receberá, investimos em cursos e todos tem a possibilidade de virar sócio após o primeiro ano em contrato de vesting; Obs: Todos que trabalham com a probono recebem o mesmo valor de R$2.000,00. Necessário ser MEI. A vaga não é CLT. Local: Ed. Victoria Office Tower. Setor de Autarquias Sul Q. 4 Bloco A - Asa Sul, Brasília - DF, 70070-938. Perfil: - Interessada em conhecer o meio de startup; - Aberto a críticas e mudanças; - Gostar de trabalhar em grupo; - Autogerenciável; - Inquieto e sempre buscando melhorias. Conhecimento necessário: - Conhecimento em Node.js; - Conhecimento em Javascript(ES6); - Conhecimento em React; - Conhecimento em Python; - Não é necessário conhecimento jurídico. Funções: - Desenvolvimento de aplicações full stack; - Planejamento e descoberta de novas features; - Pesquisa de dores e novas features; - Planejamento de futuras entregas; - Desenvolvimento de pipelines de integração/entrega contínua; - Descoberta de novas métricas de resultado e trabalho; - Descoberta de novas atividades, necessidades e funções de desenvolvimento. Quem somos? - A Probono é uma legaltech que vem crescendo bastante. Para conhecer mais entre no nosso site https://probono.digital/ Requisitos: - Ter computador para exercer as funções da empresa; - Aceitamos somente cadastros pelo LinkedIn; - Não aceitaremos cadastro sem currículo. Etapas: - Seleção curricular Vamos selecionar as pessoas que se encaixam na vaga conforme divulgada; - Envio de trabalho técnico Será enviado um trabalho idêntico a todos participantes. Serão selecionados os trabalhos que cumprem com o esperado; - Debate sobre solução criada Todos os selecionados irão debater sobre as soluções propostas por cada um e devem chegar a uma solução em conjunto. Nesta etapa estamos avaliando comportamento, procuramos pessoas que gostam de trabalhar em grupo, sabem expor suas ideias, escutar as ideias diferentes e chegar a uma melhor solução. - Resultado Após a entrevista uma pessoa será selecionada. Todos serão avisados do resultado próprio.

snippet: Conhecimento em sistemas operacionais MS Windows Server (2008, 2012 ou superior), GNU/Linux (Debian, Suse, Fedora e Red Hat) e Unix (...
fulltext: Vaga de Analista De Aplicação Web em Distrito Federal. A combinar. Período Integral. Efetivo – CLT Área e especialização profissional: Informática, TI, TelecomunicaçõesTI Nível hierárquico: Analista Local de trabalho: Brasília, DF Regime de contratação de tipo Efetivo – CLT Jornada Período Integral Atividades: Criar padrão de layout da aplicação via software conforme demanda recebida. Implementar soluções baseadas em tecnologia Web. Realizar análise, avaliação técnica e estimativa de esforço para desenvolvimento de soluções e funcionalidades. Obter aprovação do modelo do layout criado junto ao solicitante. Implementar layout da aplicação no sistema. Atualizar canais de comunicação conforme alinhamento realizado junto ao cliente e equipe envolvida. Criar/ atualizar código fonte de página web. Produzir aplicação de acordo com regras de negócio definidas junto ao cliente. Publicar a aplicação nos ambientes do cliente. Validar aplicação junto ao cliente e equipe envolvida. Realizar atendimentos à operação, identificando as causas-raiz dos incidentes relatados, atendendo-os e direcionando para gestão de problemas. Propor soluções e atuar tanto na parte de frontend quanto backend; Garantir a qualidade dos seus entregáveis, se comprometendo com prazos estipulados e níveis de qualidade de código acertados. Validar aplicação junto ao cliente. Elaborar documentos pertinentes à atuação. Requisitos Exigidos: Ensino Superior em áreas de TI Experiência em atividades de administração de redes e infraestrutura para sistemas, operacionais Linux e Windows, incluindo servidores de aplicação Java (Tomcat, Jboss, Oracle Application Server, Oracle Weblogic, IBM Websphere), servidores WEB (Apache, MS-IIS) com extensões para as linguagens PHP, Perl, Python, ASP, .NET, e infraestrutura de portais de conteúdo Zope/Plone. Experiência em sistemas de virtualização VMWare ou similares, e com gerência e orquestração de ambiente virtualizado. Experiência em atividades de instalação, manutenção e configuração de hardware de servidores do tipo rack e blade center. Conhecimento em sistemas operacionais MS Windows Server (2008, 2012 ou superior), GNU/Linux (Debian, Suse, Fedora e Red Hat) e Unix (Solaris e AIX), Redes de Computadores, Arquitetura de Computadores, Lógica de Programação e Scripting (shell script), Servidores de Logs (solução ELK); Servidores de nuvem privada Owncloud/Nextcloud); Servidores de gestão de conteúdo online (Collabora e Only Office). Certificações: “Red Hat Certified System Administrator – RHCSA” ou “Linux Professional Institute Certification – LPIC2”. “Red Hat Certified JBoss Administrator – RHCJA” ou similar VMware Certified Advanced Professional 5Data Center Administration, ou similar Red Hat Certified Specialist in Ansible Automation (EX407) ou similar Red Hat® OpenShift® Container Platform ou similar. DevOps Master ou similar VMware Certified Professional 6Virtualização de Rede (VCP6-NV) ou superior Regime de Contratação: CLT Benefícios: Vale-transporte ou Auxílio Combustível; Vale Alimentação ou Refeição; Plano de Saúde e Odontológico. Salário a Combinar Horário: 8h às 18h Benefícios adicionais: Assistência médica, Assistência odontológica, Auxílio combustível, Bônus por resultado, Seguro de Vida, Vale-alimentação, Vale-refeição, Vale-transporte

fulltext: Empresa Contratante Empresa Contratante: Instituto de Pesquisa Ambiental da Amazônia (IPAM) Ramo da Atividade: Pesquisa ambiental O Instituto de Pesquisa Ambiental da Amazônia (IPAM) é uma organização cientí­fica, não-governamental e sem fins lucrativos que trabalha por um desenvolvimento sustentável da Amazônia que seja pautado pelo crescimento econômico, pela justiça social e pela proteção da integridade funcional dos ecossistemas da região. Fundado em 29 de maio de 1995, em Belém (PA), o IPAM surgiu com uma proposta inovadora na época: engajar a ciência e o ativismo ambiental na região amazônica, construindo bases para a ação de movimentos sociais e para a formulação de políticas públicas. Dados da Vaga Pesquisador Auxiliar Requisitos/Perfil Desejado Formação: Ensino Superior em Ciências Ambientais, Biologia, Geografia, Engenharia Florestal ou Ambiental, Ecologia ou áreas afins. Desejável curso de pós-graduação ou mestrado. Experiência em mapeamento da cobertura e uso da terra, índices de vegetação, degradação florestal e/ou incêndios florestais. Conhecimento médio a avançado sobre sensoriamento remoto e SIG. Facilidade de aprendizado de novas ferramentas de geoprocessamento e SIG. Conhecimento sobre código florestal e políticas ambientais. Conhecimento básico de ferramentas da Google (ex. Google Earth Engine, Google Earth, Google Code Editor). Desejável conhecimento básico de programação (ex. R, Python, PHP, Javascript, Java, SQL). Desejável conhecimento e experiência de campo em fitofisionomias do bioma Cerrado. Atribuições e Responsabilidades Mapear as fitofisionomias, da degradação e dos incêndios florestais do bioma Cerrado. Realizar análises sobre código florestal, incluindo seus instrumentos como Cadastro Ambiental Rural, Programas de Regularização Ambiental e Cotas de Reserva Ambiental. poiar a elaboração de análises e mapas temáticos em Sistema de Informação Geográfica- SIG. Elaboração de relatórios e publicações. Organizar eventos, cursos e seminários. Observação No dia 29/09 apenas os pré-selecionados serão contactados para a entrevista. Entrevistas devem ocorrer no dia 03 e 04/10. Início previsto das atividades: 10/10/2016. Envio de Currículos Envio de currículos até dia 24 de Setembro de 2016 Por gentileza, somente enviar currículo profissionais que se encaixem no perfil, de forma a economizar seu tempo e do recrutador. Documentos Necessários Currículo (máximo de 3 páginas) Carta de apresentação com experiência em relação aos quesitos essenciais, obrigatórios e desejáveis, além de pretensão salarial (máximo 2 páginas) Recrutamento Encerrado

Fundado em 29 de maio de 1995, em Belém (PA), o IPAM surgiu com uma proposta inovadora na época: engajar a ciência e o ativismo ambiental na região amazônica, construindo bases para a ação de movimentos sociais e para a formulação de políticas públicas. title: Cientista de Dados
subtitle: BIUD Marketing
snippet: Nosso foco principal é desenvolver o marketing do empreendedor, profissional liberal e comerciantes que necessitam de serviços de ...
fulltext: Oi! Somos a BIUD :) Uma startup com soluções de comunicação e marketing para pequenas empresas e grandes empreendedores! Nosso foco principal é desenvolver o marketing do empreendedor, profissional liberal e comerciantes que necessitam de serviços de marketing, mas nem sempre sabem por onde começar e necessitam de uma assessoria especializada. Buscamos constantemente profissionais colaborativos, engajados com o conceito do negócio e que tem ideias inovadoras. Tem expertise em apuração e análise de dados? Tem afinidade com interpretações na área de marketing e vendas? Gosta de trabalhar com novos desafios? Vem conhecer a vaga! Responsabilidades > Realizar etapa de ETL a partir de dado bruto; > Realizar pré processamento com limpeza de dados e tratamento de outliers; > Realizar tarefas de análise exploratória, gerando insights no contexto dos projetos; > Auxiliar nas etapas de modelagem de dados, usando algoritmos de machine learning e social network analysis, e avaliação de modelos; > Gerar relatórios, apresentações e visualizações de dados, relativos aos resultados dos projetos. Requisitos > Graduação/Graduando em Engenharia de Computação, Ciência da Computação, Matemática, Estatística, Física ou área relacionada; > Proficiência em Python e interesse em aprender R; > Interesse em aprender machine learning e social network analysis; > Familiaridade com banco de dados relacional; > Escrita e leitura em inglês; > Boas habilidades de comunicação e apresentação; > Boa capacidade de resolver problemas; > Capacidade de aprender sozinho. Diferenciais > Experiência com machine learning e frameworks de machine learning, como Scikit-Learn, Pytorch, Tensorflow, Numpy e Pandas; > Experiência com social network analysis e software Gephi; > Familiaridade com estatística e probabilidade. Experiência com metodologias ágeis de gestão de projeto.

IBM Services partners with the world's leading companies in over 170 countries to build smarter businesses by reimagining and reinventing through technology, with its outcome-focused methodologies, industry-leading portfolio and world class research and operations expertise leading to results-driven innovation and enduring excellence. title: Atlassian Integration Front-end Developer
subtitle: Toptal
snippet: Providing a great user experience is crucial to us, and we’re always looking for talented front-end web developers to help us reach the ...
fulltext: About Toptal Job Description Toptal is a global network of top talent in business, design, and technology that enables companies to scale their teams, on-demand. With $200+ million in annual revenue and over 40% year-over-year growth, Toptal is the largest fully distributed workforce in the world. We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation, social interaction, and fun (see this video from The Huffington Post). We see no borders, move at a fast pace, and are never afraid to break the mold. Position Description Providing a great user experience is crucial to us, and we’re always looking for talented front-end web developers to help us reach the next level. By joining our team, you will get the opportunity to work with a team of highly skilled front-end experts from around the world. In this role, you will get the opportunity to build creative solutions for a fully-customized Confluence Cloud environment. As an experienced Atlassian developer you will have the autonomy to build the best solution to accomplish critical objectives. Your work will have an enormous impact on the day-to-day operations at Toptal and will be used by everyone from fellow developers to the Executive Team. This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere. All communication and resumes must be submitted in English. Responsibilities Translate UI/UX designs wireframes and business requirements into code. Customize Atlassian’s Confluence Cloud through proprietary add-ons. Support and maintain ReactJS code that integrates the Atlassian-Connect-Express (ACE) toolkit for Confluence Cloud with other Rest API services. Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable React code. QA your code with tests and perform manual testing of your features. Review the work of your colleagues. As a true team player, you continuously improve your team’s processes, brainstorm ideas, and communicate your status and progress. Mentor other people, provide feedback, and continuously improve yourself. We Are Expecting From You To Have 5+ years of front-end web development experience with a preference given to candidates who have experience with ReactJS Have experience customizing Confluence Cloud Have experience working with Atlassian-Connect-Express toolkit Proficiency in client-side scripting and Javascript frameworks is a must including experience with NodeJS server-side scripting and with the Atlassian-Connect-Express is preferred. Have experience working with Atlassian’s Confluence and Jira. Consider multiple quality dimensions like user impact, failure tolerance, code maintenance, implementation time, security breaches, and performance. Have an understanding of code versioning tools such as Github. Have experience with Continuous Delivery tools such as Jenkins. Be genuinely interested in technology and love to try new things. Solve complex problems but also consider multiple solutions, weigh them, and decide on the best course of action. Thrive on providing and receiving honest but always constructive feedback. You must be a world-class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal. For Toptal Use Only: #individualcontributorEurope, #individualcontributorSA, #southamerica

fulltext: Job Description Somos a AIS Digital construímos produtos digitais para entregar experiências incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais, internacionais e startups. Para saber mais acesse: www.aisdigital.com.br ou www.aisdigital.gupy.io Cadastre-se criando seu login na plataforma já pela sua conta do LinkedIn. É rapidinho e o sistema já puxa todo seu currículo do Linkedin para a plataforma automaticamente. Main responsibilities Desenvolver um sistema capaz de sugerir conteúdo e produtos de acordo com o comportamento do usuário dentro de uma plataforma de conteúdo de video, imagens, eventos, gamificação e compras. O projeto está em fase inicial utilizando as mais recentes versões da linguagem e do framework e envolve trabalhar com as melhores práticas do mercado para código limpo e de alta escalabilidade. Requirements And Skills O que você precisa para fazer parte do nosso time? Experiência em framewoks javascript como VueJs e VueX; Dominio do Javascript; Conhecimentos em HTML5 + CSS3; Conhecimentos em pré-processador CSS como (sass, less...); Conhecimentos em Desing Responsivo e Cross-platform. O que pode te diferenciar (não são requisitos obrigatórios): Conhecimentos em processos de CI/CD; Conhecimentos em Arquitetura MVC; Conhecimentos em Testes unitários; Conhecimento em Webpack, ESlint, Yarn; Experiência no uso de ferramentas de versionamento de código: GIT; Experiência em alguma metodologia ágil como Scrum e/ou Kanban e uso do JIRA. Additional information Benefícios Contrato de Trabalho CLT - 40h semanais flexíveis com possibilidade de contratação Home Office em qualquer região/ cidade ou contratação presencial em Brasília ou São Paulo. Assistência Médica e Odontológica Vale Refeição ou Alimentação Gostou da oportunidade? Cadastre-se na vaga, acessando a plataforma com sua conta do LinkedIn, é rapidinho e já puxa todo seu currículo por lá. Venha fazer parte do nosso time! Awesome Deliveries Ajudamos nossos clientes a construírem produtos e experiências digitais úteis, impactantes e incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais e internacionais. Fazemos questão de trabalhar em busca da melhor experiência para o usuário. Somos mais de 100 apaixonados por tecnologia e inovação, que trabalham sempre juntos e conectados nos nossos escritórios em São Paulo e Brasília. Aprendizagem é um dos nossos valores como empresa. Aqui, temos espaço de sobra para disseminar o conhecimento. Além disso, investimos em diversas ações internas para que todos possam compartilhar experiências, aprender e ensinar coisas novas. Nos últimos 3 anos, crescemos 60% do nosso faturamento e nossos clientes internacionais já representam aproximadamente 40% de toda a nossa receita. E o nosso objetivo é crescer ainda mais nos próximos anos! Como fazemos entregas incríveis? Somos fãs de velocidade e eficiência, por isso, aceleramos o desenvolvimento dos produtos digitais por meio de nossos frameworks ágeis, inspirados no método Scrum. Também acreditamos que as novas tecnologias são capazes de proporcionar mudanças transformadoras. E nós amamos inovar! Além disso, temos equipes organizadas em pequenos times chamados "squads", que trabalham de maneira interdisciplinar e integrada. Fazemos questão de concentrar nossa energia na satisfação do cliente, qualidade e geração de valor para que todas as entregas sejam realmente incríveis. Acreditamos que esses três pilares garantem o que sabemos fazer de melhor: Awesome Deliveries. Conheça mais sobre nós

title: Sr Sales Engineer - Brazil
subtitle: Cisco
snippet: Here’s how we do it. Ideally, you are ambitious and self-motivated, and have experience with application performance management ...
fulltext: To be a successful Sales Engineer at Cisco/AppDynamics, you need to have experience in a customer-facing role, and be passionate about working with customers. Ideally, you are ambitious and self-motivated, and have experience with application performance management technologies and techniques and Cloud and Big Data technologies. Other qualifications we are looking for include 3-5 years experience working with at least one of the following languages Java, .NET, PHP, and JavaScript. Experience and competence working at OS command lines including Unix, Linux and Windows command prompts. Experience With Unix/Linux/Windows Shell Scripting Knowledge of basic networking components and concepts. Ability to solve problems of basic networking issues that may prevent communication between hosts Experience with web servers and common relational databases used in today’s application architectures. Ability to understand SQL. Excellent Communication And Presentation Skills Ability to work on multiple technical opportunities & Proof Of Concepts concurrently Highly coachable with a strong desire to improve and grow as a professional. Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering. Desired Experience & Skills Experience with application performance management technologies and techniques Experience With Cloud And Big Data Technologies Experience with common .NET web application architecture frameworks, distribution mechanisms and messaging components such as Experience with common Java web application architecture frameworks, distribution mechanisms and messaging components such as servlets, struts, Spring, EJB, web services, RMI, JMS, MQ-Series, etc. We Are Cisco #WeAreCisco, where each person is unique, but we bring our talents to work as a team and make a difference. Here’s how we do it. We embrace digital, and help our customers implement change in their digital businesses. Some may think we’re “old” (30 years strong!) and only about hardware, but we’re also a software company. And a security company. A blockchain company. An AI/Machine Learning company. We even invented an intuitive network that adapts, predicts, learns and protects. No other company can do what we do – you can’t put us in a box! But “Digital Transformation” is an empty buzz phrase without a culture that allows for innovation, creativity, and yes, even failure (if you learn from it.) Day to day, we focus on the give and take. We give our best, we give our egos a break and we give of ourselves (because giving back is built into our DNA.) We take accountability, we take bold steps, and we take difference to heart. Because without diversity of thought and a commitment to equality for all, there is no moving forward. So, you have colorful hair? Don’t care. Tattoos? Show off your ink. Like polka dots? That’s cool.

Security models and techniques within the salesforce.com environment. Experience in Database modeling, jquery, JSON, JSP, XML, HTML, JavaScript. Utilising ChangeSets, etc, for migration of objects/metadata from one (development/sandbox) organisation to another (Sandbox or production) using ANT scripts and creating packages. Experience in importing and exporting data in Salesforce.com. SFDC certification is highly desired Certified Developer II Ability to code and unit test programs / objects. title: Software Architect - $200,000/year USD - JobID #3293
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work f
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our VP of Technical Product Management position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Software Architect or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you an expert at making simple but powerful technical decisions? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? Do you think getting the core data structures and algorithms right is essential to solving customer problems? If so, you’ll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs are deeply technical; most of them come from a strong product engineering background. We believe in a focus on First Principles. For software, that means: We focus on designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog We focus on core data structures and algorithms, not on the UI/UX layer We focus on maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Make clear, simple, and technically sound design decisions Simplify designs that others have made complicated Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Coach a team, primarily by providing high-quality feedback on their work Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing production code in either Java or C# for a commercial software company. At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience creating simple but important messages for sales and marketing teams Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). What you will be doing: Crossover TPMs get to work across a portfolio of products and cover a range of industries and technologies, making this an amazing learning opportunity. TPMs are encouraged to learn and apply the latest cloud computing patterns (think about the entire AWS catalog, not just EC2 & S3). They also receive tons of training and development, starting with our one-month CTO Bootcamp program. There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3293-BR-Brasília-SoftwareArchit.005

title: Application Developer Fullstack
subtitle: IBM
snippet:
Introduction
As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and developme
fulltext: Introduction As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact! Your Role and Responsibilities Application Developer Fullstack Required Technical and Professional Expertise Required Experience With React, Java And Java Script. Developer for Mobile team of the client. All positions are eligible for people with disabilities or rehabilitated.***  Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise Developer fullstack. About Business Unit IBM Services is a team of business, strategy and technology consultants that design, build, and run foundational systems and services that is the backbone of the world's economy. IBM Services partners with the world's leading companies in over 170 countries to build smarter businesses by reimagining and reinventing through technology, with its outcome-focused methodologies, industry-leading portfolio and world class research and operations expertise leading to results-driven innovation and enduring excellence. Your Life @ IBM What matters to you when you’re looking for your next career challenge? Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities – where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible. Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever. About IBM IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries. Location Statement For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application. Being You @ IBM IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

fulltext: A Vertigo Tecnologia é uma consultoria de negócios focada em TI, onde agilidade e inovação são aspectos que levamos muito a sério. Temos como objetivo ajudar os nossos clientes a crescer utilizando a Tecnologia da Informação, é isso que fazemos! Estamos com uma vaga para Arquiteto de Software / Líder Técnicopara Brasília, queatuará nodesenvolvimento do design de alto nível e ditará os padrões técnicos, incluindo codificação,ferramentas e plataformas de codificação de software, atuando como referência técnica daOrganização. Pré-requisitos Graduação completa na área de Tecnologia da Informação; Pós-graduação ou Certificação na área de Arquitetura (de Software, Soluções ou Corporativa). Conhecimentos de Integração Contínua / Entrega Contínua. Soluções em Nuvem; Experiência na implantação de soluções de integração (ESB, e API Gateway) com sistemas de legado. Experiência com Tecnologias em ascensão no mercado, como: Containers, Serverless, PaaS Bancos de dados SQL Server; Fluência com Java (Spring) e PHP. Experiência com automatização de testes (incluindo testes de carga); Conhecimento em áreas afins como infraestrutura, segurança... Inglês técnico. Noções de: Sistemas de alta disponibilidade e Arquitetura de micro serviços As Principais Tarefas Deste Profissionais Serão Avaliar e recomendar ferramentas, tecnologias e processos para garantir uma plataforma de produtos em constante evolução oferecendo os mais altos padrões de qualidade, confiabilidade e desempenho. Projetar, apoiar no desenvolvimento e acompanhar a execução de soluções de software com foco em resolver problemas de negócios. Fornecer projetos de arquitetura e liderança técnica para a equipe de TI interna e para os fornecedores. Ajudar a equipe a solucionar problemas de nível de código com rapidez e eficiência. “Meter a mão na massa” quando a situação for crítica o suficiente.. fulltext: A Revelo é uma plataforma que coloca você como protagonista do seu processo de contratação. Preencha seu cadastro e tenha a chance de mostrar para mais de 3.000 empresas que você é o candidato certo para elas. Aqui você não precisa se candidatar para várias vagas, como sempre fez. É só criar o seu perfil em nossa plataforma e pronto. Sobre o Processo Com a Revelo Você pode receber até 10 convites de entrevistas em uma semana; Ao invés de se candidatar para diversas vagas, é só criar seu perfil e você já fica visível para todas as empresas cadastradas; O processo é totalmente gratuíto para você; Quando for contratado, você ganha um bônus de até R$2.000; Complete o seu perfil e aguarde para ter acesso a um processo online e exclusivo. Conheça as habilidades e os conhecimentos mais procurados por nossas empresas:  Java  PHP  REST  Jenkins  Java EE Tem essas habilidades? Cadastre-se agora! Temos diversas empresas como OLX, B2W, Ambev, Banco Votorantim, Gympass, entre outras milhares procurando por profissionais em Brasília, Distrito Federal, com salários a partir de R$3000. Cadastre-se agora e revele seu potencial. Sobre a Revelo A Revelo (https://www.revelo.com.br/) é uma plataforma online de recrutamento que revela o que está além do CV. Nossa tecnologia seleciona os melhores candidatos das carreiras mais estratégicas - desenvolvimento de software, design, marketing e negócios. Para profissionais que querem ser protagonistas de sua própria carreira, a Revelo permite descobrir vagas que não estão nos canais tradicionais. São mais de 2.000 das empresas mais inovadoras do Brasil utilizando a Revelo para descobrir seus novos talentos. Revelo. Vá além do CV.

title: Backend Node.JS
subtitle: AIS DIGITAL
snippet: Atuar em um dos projetos internacionais mais inovadores da empresa, participando junto ao time na construção do backend de uma ...
fulltext: Job Description Somos a AIS Digital construímos produtos digitais para entregar experiências incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais, internacionais e startups. Para saber mais acesse: www.aisdigital.com.br ou www.aisdigital.gupy.io Cadastre-se criando seu login na plataforma já pela sua conta do LinkedIn. É rapidinho e o sistema já puxa todo seu currículo do Linkedin para a plataforma automaticamente. Main responsibilities Atuar em um dos projetos internacionais mais inovadores da empresa, participando junto ao time na construção do backend de uma solução robusta utilizando arquitetura voltada a microsserviços, integração com API e técnicas de segurança. Requirements And Skills O que você precisa para fazer parte do nosso time? Experiência avançada com Node.JS Experiência com Express.JS Experiência com bancos relacionais (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle) e MongoDB; Desenho e construção de API's RestFUL. O que pode te diferenciar? Conhecimento em técnica de criptografia; Implementado projetos envolvendo arquiteturas voltadas a microsserviços; Conhecimento com messaging queue (RabbitMQ, Kafka); Experiência na implementação de aplicações usando padrão MVC; Experiência utilização de ferramentas de versionamento: SVN e GIT; Experiência na utilização de Integração Contínua; Experiência em alguma metodologia ágil: Ágil, Scrum ou Kanban; Conhecimento em design patterns, refactoring e testes unitários; Vontade de aprender novas tecnologias e linguagens; Gostar de trabalhar em equipes; Visão crítica do negócio para resolução de problemas e inovação; Inglês intermediário/avançado. Additional information Benefícios Contrato de Trabalho CLT - 40h semanais flexíveis podendo ser realizadas de Brasília, São Paulo, ou Home Office de qualquer estado.  Assistência Médica e Odontológica Vale Refeição ou Alimentação Gostou da oportunidade? Então cadastre-se criando seu login na plataforma já pela sua conta do LinkedIn. É rapidinho e o sistema já puxa todo seu currículo do Linkedin para a plataforma automaticamente. Venha fazer parte do nosso time! Awesome Deliveries Ajudamos nossos clientes a construírem produtos e experiências digitais úteis, impactantes e incríveis para grandes marcas nacionais e internacionais. Fazemos questão de trabalhar em busca da melhor experiência para o usuário. Somos mais de 100 apaixonados por tecnologia e inovação, que trabalham sempre juntos e conectados nos nossos escritórios em São Paulo e Brasília. Aprendizagem é um dos nossos valores como empresa. Aqui, temos espaço de sobra para disseminar o conhecimento. Além disso, investimos em diversas ações internas para que todos possam compartilhar experiências, aprender e ensinar coisas novas. Nos últimos 3 anos, crescemos 60% do nosso faturamento e nossos clientes internacionais já representam aproximadamente 40% de toda a nossa receita. E o nosso objetivo é crescer ainda mais nos próximos anos! Como fazemos entregas incríveis? Somos fãs de velocidade e eficiência, por isso, aceleramos o desenvolvimento dos produtos digitais por meio de nossos frameworks ágeis, inspirados no método Scrum. Também acreditamos que as novas tecnologias são capazes de proporcionar mudanças transformadoras. E nós amamos inovar! Além disso, temos equipes organizadas em pequenos times chamados "squads", que trabalham de maneira interdisciplinar e integrada. Fazemos questão de concentrar nossa energia na satisfação do cliente, qualidade e geração de valor para que todas as entregas sejam realmente incríveis. Acreditamos que esses três pilares garantem o que sabemos fazer de melhor: Awesome Deliveries. Conheça mais sobre nós

title: Principal Architect - $200,000/year USD - JobID #3293
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our VP of Technical Product Management position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Principal Architect or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you an expert at making simple but powerful technical decisions? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? Do you think getting the core data structures and algorithms right is essential to solving customer problems? If so, you’ll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs are deeply technical; most of them come from a strong product engineering background. We believe in a focus on First Principles. For software, that means: We focus on designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog We focus on core data structures and algorithms, not on the UI/UX layer We focus on maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Make clear, simple, and technically sound design decisions Simplify designs that others have made complicated Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Coach a team, primarily by providing high-quality feedback on their work Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing production code in either Java or C# for a commercial software company. At least 4 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience creating simple but important messages for sales and marketing teams Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). What you will be doing: Crossover TPMs get to work across a portfolio of products and cover a range of industries and technologies, making this an amazing learning opportunity. TPMs are encouraged to learn and apply the latest cloud computing patterns (think about the entire AWS catalog, not just EC2 & S3). They also receive tons of training and development, starting with our one-month CTO Bootcamp program. There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3293-BR-Brasília-PrincipalArchi

fulltext: Job Description Trabalhe em uma multinacional Israelense, referência em soluções de tecnologia no Brasil. Estamos com oportunidades para Desenvolvedor BPM \ SOA. Main responsibilities Realizar implementação dos códigos fontes de artefatos de implementação (classes, pacotes, builds, componentes, serviços, aplicações, scripts de bancos de dados) de acordo com os padrões de arquitetura e projeto definidos. Seguir as melhores práticas definidas para codificação na linguagem de programação e framework adotados. Realizar testes unitários nas classes desenvolvidas e capturar evidências desses testes. Implementar e implantar serviços e componentes para IBM Websphere Application Server. Criação de testes unitários e testes por comportamento (BDD). Desenvolver aplicações BPM utilizando notação BPEL e BPMN. Requirements And Skills Formação de nível superior na área de informática, ou formação de nível superior com curso de pós-graduação na área de informática. Experiência mínima (em meses) exercendo desenvolvendo soluções com foco em BPM ou SOA. Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações de processo para servidor de aplicação IBM WebSphere Process Server. Análise e tunning de performance de aplicações de processo em servidores WebSphere Process Server. Experiência na construção de aplicações que possuam características como: Uso intensivo de dados, balanceamento de carga e/ou clusterização; Chamadas assíncronas e troca de mensagens; Uso de serviços web SOAP e REST. Experiência no desenvolvimento de soluções que utilizem motores de execução de processos, malhas de serviços e interfaces em CMS (Liferay). Experiência na implementação de soluções que utilizem arquitetura orientada à serviços ou micro serviços. Experiência no uso das seguintes ferramentas: IBM Integration Bus, IBM DB2, MS SQL Server, IBM Websphere MQ, Apache Maven e Gradle. Additional information CLT ou PJ, horário comercial. Sobre a Ewave Atuando no mercado brasileiro desde 2006, a Ewave do Brasil é parte do grupo Ewave, de Israel. Hoje, já somos um dos principais fornecedores de serviços de soluções de tecnologia do mercado brasileiro. MISSÃO** Estar sempre à frente na criação e disponibilização de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras para o mercado, auxiliando nossos clientes a alcançarem seus resultados com a máxima excelência. VISÃO** Sustentada em seus valores e guiada sempre pela paixão em servir com excelência, ser reconhecida e admirada pelo mercado, clientes e parceiros, como uma das maiores provedoras de soluções tecnológicas inovadoras. title: Systems Support Engineer 2
subtitle: Teradata
snippet: Communication skill and Leadership skill are one of the crucial skills needed as he/she is required to mentor other SSEs and technically ...
fulltext: System Support Engineer Location Brazil, Brasilia  System Support Engineer (SSE) Associate would be responsible for providing on-site or remote support for Teradata Customers. Typically, these customers have 24/7 support contracts and the successful applicant must be prepared to be on-call every other week to support customer site/s. The support engineers will be looking after the system’s MPP/SMP hardware, /Linux/Windows operating system and Teradata products such as Teradata Database, Teradata Aster database and Hadoop systems. Pro-active maintenance and high level of professionalism is the key in this role. Apart from the above the person will be responsible from all technical issues’ resolution, escalation as well as site planning, proactive work and Change Controls and performance auditing and tuning for assigned site. This SSE will be working very closely with the customer, other CS team members as well as the account team. The candidate will coordinate all aspects of service delivery issues for the site with the local and regional support teams. While technical, the role is about being a presence on the ground and within the working fabric of the customer’s EDW to be proactive and optimize the customer’s EDW. The candidate will drive all Severity 1 incidents and hot issues for customer sites and work after hours and weekends as required. The candidate will be specializing in high availability and system performance issues and requirements. Driving customer site to become more stable and optimized and take the full advantage of what Teradata Product could offer in this space. This position will also drive regular or ad-hoc customer support meeting to review the support performance and advise customer the best system HW and SW upgrade paths. Facilitates and leads formal review customer meeting (including key Teradata, the customer personnel) which will include but not be limited to the above elements. Communication skill and Leadership skill are one of the crucial skills needed as he/she is required to mentor other SSEs and technically leads all local SSEs who might be involved with the site support from time to time during the high priority issues and Change Controls. The he/she, having strong project management skills, will fulfill the role of expert on customer requirements for the assigned account and escalate any issues, as necessary, to the appropriate parties. As this is a hand on position, he/she is required to be very proficient with Teradata products and CS maintenance procedures so that could carry out of all field CS actions for the assigned systems or customers This is a customer facing role and would require some travel with in the territory or abroad. Training in the form of in-class and self-study will be provided and various certifications will be strongly encouraged. Major Responsibilities And Tasks Respond to all the calls from the customer Account Management Skills. Perform hardware break –fix Perform hardware and software installations and upgrades includes site or system preparations Perform preliminary software problem investigation and diagnostics collection Manage system-based Change Controls for O/S, Teradata SW and HW environment Perform Operating System or Teradata Software upgrades Escalate all unresolved issues to the Regional Level-2 Support Centre as per the Incident escalation process Provide feedback to the customer for reported issues As per the Customer Support Contract provide the Site and Service reports Provide technical assistance to Sales organization as required System Health Check Review, System management reporting and oversight of technical support issues. Software release management, including review and recommendations on software updates. Maintain and review Teradata interoperability and compatibility matrices and provide proactive recommendations to the customer. Regular review of system usage (performance and capacity), including identification of potential issues and / or opportunities. This would include the facilitation of any appropriate resources to ensure the optimal recommendations are provided. Facilitate and lead formal review customer meeting (including key Teradata, the customer personnel) which will include but not be limited to the above elements. The candidate will provide reviews of the Operational environment to identify risks and potential mitigation strategies  Power-fail recovery strategy Data protection Operational processes Recovery processes Application/database recovery processes Patches/maintenance as applicable Field Retrofit Orders (FRO), preventive maintenance Tech Alert review and knowledge transfer Facilities & Environmental Planning Insure that data center has adequate power, cooling and floor space to support the configurations being implemented at the customer site and to insure there is room for future expansions. Configuration Planning Work with the customer and sales team to determine optimal configuration based on customer batch and online response time requirements. CS Best Practices Implementation Teradata Customer Services has developed several best practices that should be implemented by each local site team to help improve customer system availability. Change Control Management The person is Teradata Customer Services' lead in coordinating and implementing system changes. The SSE will work with the Customer and with Teradata Customer Services to identify patches and updates which would benefit the Customer’s operation. System Availability Reporting The person will provide system availability reports. The root cause of specific outages will be identified, and analysis completed with recommended changes to improve system availability. The SSE will review the system availability results and make any recommendations that are necessary Service Reporting The person will also serve as Teradata Customer Services' lead in the service performance reports. The SSE will provide the reporting, facilitate the meetings and drive any open issues to resolution. Parts Management Working with customer for management of Parts Delivery on site. Receiving good and defectives parts return on time. Ensure hot spares (if installed) are up and running to ensure working parts availability for maintenance activities. Management of On-Site Remedial & Preventive Maintenance Escalation Management Should the Customer need to escalate a service incident, the person will be the initial point of escalation contact and engage the correct Teradata Customer Services' resources within Teradata Customer Services to ensure that the incident is resolved to the customer’s satisfaction. The person will then keep the Customer regularly posted on the status of the incident and the progress being made in bringing it to closure. Management of System Upgrades The person will work with the Customer, Project Manager and Teradata Customer Services local and region teams to develop a plan for each hardware and/or software upgrade. The plan will include a definition of scope, a list of critical path items, identification of the resources required, and a project timeline. The person will function as Teradata Customer Services' lead for these upgrades and will schedule and coordinate the activities of Teradata Customer Services' resources. The person will be the Customer’s primary contact for the implementation of the upgrade. Customer Support Plan The person will ensure the development, currency, and accuracy of the Customer Support Plan tailored to the Customer’s environment and requirements. This plan will outline hours of coverage, response times, incident reporting numbers and processes, escalation timeframes and contact information, and availability measurement criteria. Load & Maintain Service Database The person will maintain system configuration for equipment and software in the service database. Manage Teradata Closed Loop Corrective Action (CLCA) Ensure that all incidents that cause unplanned outages identify a root cause and a corrective action is implemented that will help minimize future instances of this type of outage. Qualifications BS/BA degree in Business Technology, Computer Science, or Management Information Systems, Business Administration, Math, Statistics, or Engineering preferred. + 5 years’ experience in computer technology or related fields. Some DBA or/and SQL experience in Databases such as Teradata, Oracle. Experience/exposure in Mid-range Linux systems hardware maintenance. Strong knowledge of LINUX/UNIX Skills Some exposure to TCP networking for Linux environment. Some exposure to Windows OS environment. Shell Scripting & Programming. Understanding of disaster recovery techniques and customer client/server connectivity & configurations In-depth understanding of hardware platforms and software configuration techniques Experience with Teradata client software, networking, host operating systems, and utilities is a plus. (To help in timely identification and resolution of customer incidents) Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office components and personal computers (for generating the many reports required by the customer). Travel availability Excellent interpersonal, Leadership, relationship, negotiation, conflict management, communication, presentation and organization skills Advanced written and oral communication skills in English. Develop and enforce account policies and procedures Ownership of resolution to technical account and personnel issues Provides focus for the account support team Technical ability to take control of account Honesty, Consistency, and Integrity Investigation of software issues & problem diagnosis Ability to work under pressure and effectively with change, risk and uncertainty Customer facing experience With all the investments made in analytics, it’s time to stop buying into partial solutions that overpromise and underdeliver. It’s time to invest in answers. Only Teradata leverages all of the data, all of the time, so that customers can analyze anything, deploy anywhere, and deliver analytics that matter most to them. And we do it at scale, on-premises, in the Cloud, or anywhere in between. We call this Pervasive Data Intelligence. It’s the answer to the complexity, cost, and inadequacy of today’s analytics. And it's the way Teradata transforms how businesses work and people live through the power of data throughout the world. Join us and help create the era of Pervasive Data Intelligence.

title: Senior Ops Manager - Brasília
subtitle: Rappi
snippet: What Are You Going To Do. Coordinate face-to-face service, monitor accessory sales, answering questions regarding the Rappi experience, ...
fulltext: Rappi is the fastest growing Latin American startup ever! Backed by the world’s best investors, including Sequoia, Andreesen Horowitz, Y Combinator, DST Capital, and Softbank we reached unicorn status last year and haven’t slowed down. We deliver whatever our customers want on-demand to their doorstep in minutes, from restaurants to groceries to hard cash. We have also recently launch wallet and e-Commerce products which are taking off quickly to become the "SuperApp" of LatAm. We operate in over 40 cities across 8 countries in Latin America, with large hubs in Mexico City, Bogotá, São Paulo, and Buenos Aires. What Are You Going To Do  Coordinate face-to-face service, monitor accessory sales, answering questions regarding the Rappi experience, and solving issues throughout the deliverer's lifecycle. Conduct analyses and instill a data-driven culture. Apply data to find opportunities improving operations' efficiency and reliability. Monitor strategies to incentive and maximize partner engagement, considering an efficient operation while ensuring efficient capital utilization. Create, optimize, and scale processes. You'll be responsible for turning ideas into processes and implementing them, enabling growth and efficiency of the business operation. Manage strategic projects, lead the local team and set timelines for quickly achieving goals. Responsible for the reliability and efficiency of the operation within the city area and along with your team will monitor metrics and partners to mitigate failures and emergencies. What We Expect From You  4+ years of experience in business, finance, business intelligence, strategy or related areas. Data-driven mindset, hands-on attitude, and proven background as problem-solver. Strong leadership abilities in a fast-passed environment. Passionate about operations and comfortable conducting analysis and trials. Identify the highest priorities, provide data-based decisions, generate buy-in from the organization and operationalize strategies from idea to execution. Exceptional ability with Excel and familiarity with financial management. Bilingual proficiency in English and/or Spanish. You'll rock if have: Proficiency in SQL. Solid experience in strategic consulting or investment banking. Our Values  These are our core values. Things that are truly in our DNA. The behaviors and mental habits that have made us what we are. They are what makes us special as a team. If you feel at home when you read them you are in the right place! Highly ambitious for the greater good, but we keep things humble. Move the needle. Prioritize. Talk fast, walk fast, think fast. And execute things in parallel. Every challenge is a gift and an opportunity to grow. We deliver magic, and magic only happens when you jump off a cliff. We are all taking care of even the smallest details... to always create a positive impact in everything we do! We value diversity, we are respectful with each other and we have fun.

title: COORDENADOR DE PROJETOS (Técnico) - BRASÍLIA
subtitle: Vertigo Tecnologia
snippet: Experiências em métodos ágeis como Scrum e kanban; com coordenação de projetos e equipe e com desenvolvimento de sistemas ...
fulltext: A Vertigo Tecnologia é uma consultoria de negócios focada em TI, onde agilidade e inovação são aspectos que levamos muito a sério. Temos como objetivo ajudar os nossos clientes a crescer utilizando a Tecnologia da Informação, é isso que fazemos! Estamos com uma vaga para Coordenador(a) de Projetos para Brasília. Este(a) profissional gerenciará uma equipe multidisciplinar e irá gerir o ciclo de vida completo do desenvolvimento de sistemas para clientes externos. Pré-requisitos Graduação completa na área de Tecnologia da Informação Pós-graduação ou Certificação na área de Gerenciamento de Projetos, PMP, Scrum master certified ou Product Owner Fortes conhecimentos em IN04 Experiências em métodos ágeis como Scrum e kanban; com coordenação de projetos e equipe e com desenvolvimento de sistemas corporativos; gestão de equipes de desenvolvimento do fornecedor off-ste e no processo de especificação de sistemas para contratação de fornecedores; Excelentes habilidades de relacionamento com o cliente, outras coordenações e áreas afins da Organização Inglês técnico intermediário Desejável possuir Noções de Métricas e qualidade de software; RUP e Scrum e de Soluções em Nuvem (preferencialmente AWS), conhecimentos em CMMI-Dev e MPS.BR; e experiência com ferramentas de testes automatizados e em ambientes de integração contínua. As Principais Tarefas Deste Profissionais Serão Gerir equipe de profissionais técnicos e de negócio; equipe de fornecedores Realizar Validação técnica, verificação e testes das entregas; Gerir a qualidade das entregas e aperformance de aplicações críticas, Apoiar projetos de gestão de requisitos de negócio externos, que podem incluir atividades como: mapeamento e desenho de processos de negócio Acompanhar a execução do projeto pelos fornecedores contratados Otimizar o fluxo de trabalho e o uso de recursos para aumentar a eficiência e reduzir o custo de desenvolvimento, manutenção e suporte de aplicativos. Realizar reporte periódico sobre o andamento dos projetos, para a coordenação, gerência e clientes Realizar o tratamento das demandas corretivas durante o período de garantia Garantir a criação de documentação e transferência de conhecimentos para equipe de sustentação em pós-produção, com utilização de metodologias baseadas em boas práticas de mercado Executar o ciclo de vida do projeto desde sua concepção e iniciação até a implantação e pós-produção Executar o processo de Integração Contínua (Fábrica de Receber e Entregar Software) Escrever termos de referência para contratação de fornecedor especializado Conduzir processos baseado na IN041 O Que Oferecemos Trabalhamos com remuneração fixa (CLT Full) Vale Transporte Vale Refeição Vale Alimentação Plano de saúde Plano Odontológico Seguro de vida em grupo Interessado? Possui os requisitos? Candidate-se!

Além dessa abrangência, oferecemos soluções em tecnologias como IoT, Machine Learning, Big Data, Biometria, entre outras. Requisitos: Obrigatórios: Superior completo em TI (com diploma); Ampla experiência na área; Conhecimentos de infra-estrutura, redes, firewall, proxy, servidores virtualizados; experiência com atendimento de chamados de 1º e 2º Nível; Conhecimentos avançados de sistemas operacionais (Windows e Linux). Desejáveis: Conhecimentos em ferramentas de BI (SAP) e Conhecimentos de bancos de dados.

title: Principal Software Engineer - $100,000/year USD - JobID #3335
subtitle: Crossover for Work
snippet: What you will be doing: Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how ...
fulltext: Are you ready to turbocharge your career? Imagine a place where you are well paid, have the smartest peers, grow your skills, and can work from almost anywhere. Crossover is the future of work and a global leader in software industry talent. We are growing rapidly across nearly 50 different job positions. This listing is for our Technical Product Manager position, but we have found great applicants often have a current title of Principal Software Engineer or similar, so don’t be confused about that difference, we are glad you found us. Hit “Apply” to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Are you the best architect on your team, stuck working on the same codebase for quarters or even years at a time? Do you have 1,000 ideas about how you could make the applications you’ve inherited simpler and more maintainable if only your stakeholders would give you the time you need to do things right? Do you enjoy learning and using the latest cloud services? If so, you'll love our view of Technical Product Management. Our TPMs have strong engineering backgrounds because they are focused on different things than your typical PM. Our TPMs are focused on... Designing better and simpler technical solutions, not managing a long feature backlog. Improving core data structures and algorithms, not the UI/UX layer Maximizing the use of disruptive technology, not low-value and undifferentiated code Key responsibilities: Making Technical Decisions. Identifying the Important outcomes, Evaluating alternatives, Looking for the best/simplest pattern, deciding how to apply existing patterns to a given problem, adding detail to P2 decisions Learning Important Context. Interviewing Product Architects, Reading Docs, Using Products, Learning new APIs or Services, Reading Code, Evaluating Technical Patterns Reviewing Content. Reviewing deliverables created by Engineers. Deciding whether to Approve or Reject (with feedback). Writing. Creating milestone specs and decisions, using diagrams to communicate technical decisions. Candidate requirements: A university degree including the study of data structures, algorithms, and computing fundamentals. At least 2 years of experience writing object-oriented production code for a commercial software company. At least 2 years of experience making important architecture and design decisions; such as data domain modeling, application of design patterns, and design using third-party components. Some experience designing for cloud computing paradigms (such as Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform). The ability to simplify complex ideas and communicate them with clear, logical thinking. Nice to have Experience rebuilding/redesigning existing products on top of entirely new cloud services (for example all the AWS services beyond EC2 and S3). Experience writing technical architecture documents AWS/Azure/GCP Certifications What you will be doing: As a Crossover TPM, you will have a long-term role on a team that makes the important architecture decisions across a steady stream of product releases that are fueled by Trilogy's growing portfolio of 100s of enterprise software applications. Our TPMs use the latest cloud patterns and services to rearchitect many applications each year. Most people are lucky to have the opportunity to create foundational technical direction a few times in their careers. Because of our virtually endless supply of modernization and cloud rebuild projects, our TPMs make these decisions every week. Day-to-day, TPMs: Turn high-level technical specs into detailed designs that engineers can execute on Uphold high standards on fundamental data structures, algorithms, and architectural best practices Define the acceptance criteria to measure engineering deliverables against There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. If you found this interesting, Apply on crossover.com. After applying you will take a few online “screening” assessments to check for a basic fit, and then move on to some real-world written questions. You will also be assigned to one of our recruiting specialists who can answer questions you might have about the process, role, or company, and help you get to the final interview step. We look forward to meeting you! Crossover Job Code: LJ-3335-BR-Brasília-PrincipalSoftw.001

title: Solutions Architect
subtitle: FireEye, Inc.
snippet: FireEye’s Sales Engineering Team is seeking experienced, exceptional individuals for our sales organization in the region. 5 years or ...
fulltext: Company Description FireEye is the leader in intelligence-led security-as-a-service. Working as a seamless, scalable extension of customer security operations, FireEye offers a single platform that blends innovative security technologies, nation-state grade threat intelligence, and world-renowned Mandiant® consulting. With this approach, FireEye eliminates the complexity and burden of cyber security for organizations struggling to prepare for, prevent, and respond to cyber attacks. FireEye has over 7,500 customers across 67 countries, including more than 50 percent of the Forbes Global 2000. Job Description The Role: FireEye’s Sales Engineering Team is seeking experienced, exceptional individuals for our sales organization in the region. Ours is not a typical software sales organization. Everybody is a closer, from inside sales through executive management. Everybody. The Systems Engineer (SE) is a customer-focused technical sales professional who provides high level pre sales support and guidance to customers and collaborates with Territory Managers and partners to recommend and develop appropriate customer solution offerings. The SE acts in a consultative fashion and is looked to as an expert in his/her field by the account team, channel partners and customers. Responsibilities You will be part of a sales team responsible for meeting quarterly and annual revenue goals in support of FireEye’s product strategy. Advising customers on how best to use the products or services provided. You should have experience working with key decision-makers in information security across a variety of industries. You should also have experience in multiple security disciplines and ability to articulate requirements, architect technical solutions and demonstrate capabilities both in sales meeting and proof of concept environments. You should also have experience developing opportunities from initial lead to successful closure, or relevant experience in a professional services, consulting or related role. The position requires regional and international travel. Qualifications Strong leadership skills with the ability to prioritize and execute in a methodical and disciplined manner. Set and manage expectations with senior stake-holders and team members Excellent communication and presentation skills with the ability to present to a variety of external audiences, including being able to interact with senior executives Hands-on technical understanding of incident response, computer forensics, network and/or application security 5 years or equivalent experience in consulting or sales engineering - particularly in the areas of security incident response or system and network administration; or, other relevant experience managing technical customer relationships History of creating rapport with customers, from line technicians to C-level executives Ability to explain and demonstrate - live and in color - a complex product Fluent in spoken and written English  Goal oriented and self-managed/trained Additional Qualifications Previous technical enablement or training experience. Hands-on experience with Intrusion Detection Systems, Security Information Event Management solutions, packet analysis tools and operating system analysis Excellent knowledge of security solutions and technologies, including: Linux/Windows, Network architecture/implementation/configuration experience Knowledge of packet flow/TCP/UDP traffic Firewall technologies, SIEM, proxy technologies, anti-virus, spam and spyware solutions (Gateway and SaaS) Malware/security experience Understand Cloud solutions and architectures (Amazon, Azure) Understand and be conversant about FireEye competitors, their solutions, strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats
